casebody.data:
ROBINS
v.
TOWN OF HILLSBOROUGH. No. 154A06. Supreme Court of North Carolina. June 9, 2006. Susan K. Burkhart, for Town of Hillsborough. Seth R. Cohen, Greensboro, for Robins. Richard A. Zechini, for NCAR. Craig D. Justus, Asheville, for NCOAA.

The following order has been entered on the motion filed on the 8th day of June 2006 by Amicus (NCHBA, NCAR, NCOAA) for Leave to File Amici Curiae Brief:

"Motion Allowed by order of the Court in conference this the 9th day of June 2006."
